roleset.name: to transport in an airlift
roleset.note: AIRLIFTING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from airlifting.01-n)
AIRLIFT-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from airlift.01-n)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Tiger itself was founded by a band of gungho airmen who-2 [*T*-2] had airlifted supplies `` over the Hump '' from India to China during World War II .

example.name: without Arg3
example.text: Rebel artillerists bombarded the capital of Afghanistan , killing at least 12 people , as [the Soviet Union]-1 was reported [*-1]to be airlifting arms and food to Kabul 's forces .
